data_table.description: EDIC. Glycemia of participants with Type 1 diabetes and involved in the "Diabetes Control and Complications Trial (DCCT) and Epidemiology of Diabetes Interventions and Complications Study (EDIC)" project.

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: A1. Identifying information. Deidentified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: DBA5B
variable.description: A5b. Identifying information. Date of event uncertain

variable.name: DBB1
variable.description: B1. Clinical manifestation: loss of consciousness

variable.name: DBB2
variable.description: B2. Clinical manifestation: seizure

variable.name: DBB3
variable.description: B3. Clinical manifestation: suspected seizure

variable.name: DBB4
variable.description: B4. Clinical manifestation: difficulty in awakening

variable.name: DBB5
variable.description: B5. Clinical manifestation: irrational behavior

variable.name: DBB6
variable.description: B6. Clinical manifestation: uncontrollable behavior

variable.name: DBB7
variable.description: B7. Clinical manifestation: confusion

variable.name: DBB8
variable.description: B8. Clinical manifestation: memory loss

variable.name: DBB9
variable.description: B9. Clinical manifestation: other

variable.name: DBB10
variable.description: B10. Clinical manifestation: none

variable.name: DBC1
variable.description: C1. Blood glucose determination: was the blood glucose measured before treatment?

variable.name: DBC2
variable.description: C2. Blood glucose determination: was the blood glucose measured before treatment? Who measured?

variable.name: DBC3A
variable.description: C3a. Blood glucose determination: was the blood glucose measured before treatment? Measurement value

variable.name: DBC3B
variable.description: C3b. Blood glucose determination: was the blood glucose measured before treatment? Measurement unknown

variable.name: DBC4
variable.description: C4. Blood glucose determination: method used blood glucose monitoring before treatment: visual

variable.name: DBC5
variable.description: C5. Blood glucose determination: was blood glucose measured after treatment?

variable.name: DBC6
variable.description: C6. Blood glucose determination: was blood glucose measured after treatment? Who measured?

variable.name: DBC7A
variable.description: C7a. Blood glucose determination: was blood glucose measured after treatment? Measurement value

variable.name: DBC7B
variable.description: C7b. Blood glucose determination: was blood glucose measured after treatment? Measurement unknown

variable.name: DBC8
variable.description: C8. Blood glucose determination: method used for blood glucose monitoring after treatment

variable.name: DBD1
variable.description: D1. Treatment of clinical manifestation: symptoms reverse without treatment

variable.name: DBD2A
variable.description: D2a. Treatment of clinical manifestation: patient received assistance

variable.name: DBD2B
variable.description: D2b. Treatment of clinical manifestation: patient incapable of treating self

variable.name: DBD3
variable.description: D3. Treatment of clinical manifestation: patient hospitalized

variable.name: DBD4A
variable.description: D4a. Treatment of clinical manifestation: given intravenous glucose treatment

variable.name: DBD4B
variable.description: D4b. Treatment of clinical manifestation: given glucagon treatment

variable.name: DBD4C
variable.description: D4c. Treatment of clinical manifestation: given oral carbohydrates treatment

variable.name: DBD4D
variable.description: D4d. Treatment of clinical manifestation: other treatment administered

variable.name: DBE1
variable.description: E1. Associated events: did any associated events occur with the hypoglycemia?

variable.name: DBE1A
variable.description: E1a. Associated events: did any associated events occur with the hypoglycemia? Death

variable.name: DBE1B
variable.description: E1b. Associated events: did any associated events occur with the hypoglycemia? Irreversible neurological damage

variable.name: DBE1C
variable.description: E1c. Associated events: did any associated events occur with the hypoglycemia? Myocardial infarction

variable.name: DBE1D
variable.description: E1d. Associated events: did any associated events occur with the hypoglycemia? Stroke occurred

variable.name: DBE1E
variable.description: E1e. Associated events: did any associated events occur with the hypoglycemia? Injury requiring hospitalization

variable.name: DBE1F
variable.description: E1f. Associated events: did any associated events occur with the hypoglycemia? Injury to another person

variable.name: DBE1G
variable.description: E1g. Associated events: did any associated events occur with the hypoglycemia? Property damage

variable.name: DBE1H
variable.description: E1h. Associated events: did any associated events occur with the hypoglycemia? Traffic violation

variable.name: DBF1
variable.description: F1. Usual insulin treatment: on what treatment regimen did the hypoglycemic event occur?

variable.name: DBF2
variable.description: F2. Usual insulin treatment: pump malfunction suspected

variable.name: DBG1
variable.description: G1. Presents of assistance: patient's living arrangement

variable.name: DBG2A
variable.description: G2a. Presents of assistance: who was with the patient at the time of onset of symptoms? Parent, guardian, spouse, child or other person with whom the patient usually resides
variable.value: Parent, guardian, spouse, child or other person with whom the patient usually resides

variable.name: DBG2B
variable.description: G2b. Presents of assistance: who was with the patient at the time of onset of symptoms? Classmate

variable.name: DBG2C
variable.description: G2c. Presents of assistance: who was with the patient at the time of onset of symptoms? Passerby

variable.name: DBG2D
variable.description: G2d. Presents of assistance: who was with the patient at the time of onset of symptoms? Person not parent, etc. saw symptoms
variable.value: Person not parent, etc. saw symptoms

variable.name: DBG2E
variable.description: G2e. Presents of assistance: who was with the patient at the time of onset of symptoms? Patient alone

variable.name: DBG2F
variable.description: G2f. Presents of assistance: who was with the patient at the time of onset of symptoms? Unknown: patient cannot recall

variable.name: DBG3
variable.description: G3. Presents of assistance: person present-recognize symptoms

variable.name: DBG4
variable.description: G4. Presents of assistance: person present-reduce severity-hypoglycemic

variable.name: DBG5A
variable.description: G5a. Presents of assistance: did the person take any action which might have reduced the severity of this hypoglycemic episode? Person present gave oral carbohydrates

variable.name: DBG5B
variable.description: G5b. Presents of assistance: did the person take any action which might have reduced the severity of this hypoglycemic episode? Person present gave glucagon

variable.name: DBG5C
variable.description: G5c. Presents of assistance: did the person take any action which might have reduced the severity of this hypoglycemic episode? Person present called paramedics

variable.name: DBG5D
variable.description: G5d. Presents of assistance: did the person take any action which might have reduced the severity of this hypoglycemic episode? Unknown what person present gave

variable.name: DBG5E
variable.description: G5e. Presents of assistance: did the person take any action which might have reduced the severity of this hypoglycemic episode? What else person present did to help

variable.name: DBH1A
variable.description: H1. Diurnal frequency: approximate time frame-onset of episode

variable.name: DBH1B
variable.description: H1b. Diurnal frequency: exact time-onset of episode (o'clock)

variable.name: DBH1C
variable.description: H1c. Diurnal frequency: exact time of onset: AM/PM, or unknown

variable.name: DBH2
variable.description: H2. Diurnal frequency: onset of hypoglycemia occurred while

variable.name: DBI1
variable.description: I1. Description of event: patient's location at onset of episode
variable.value: Leisure activity outside home - other social activity

variable.name: DBI2A
variable.description: I2a. Description of event: if patient awake, warning signs or symptoms

variable.name: DBI2B
variable.description: I2b. Description of event: symptoms known as hypoglycemia by patient

variable.name: DBI2C
variable.description: I2c. Description of event: symptoms known as hypoglycemia by other person

variable.name: DBJ1A
variable.description: J1a. Potential contributing factors: exercise during 4 hours before hypoglycemia

variable.name: DBJ1B
variable.description: J1b. Potential contributing factors: unusual exercise 4 hours before hypoglycemia

variable.name: DBJ1C
variable.description: J1c. Potential contributing factors: exercise during 24 hours prior-hypoglycemia excluding the four-hours

variable.name: DBJ1D
variable.description: J1d. Potential contributing factors: unusual exercise prior to hypoglycemia event

variable.name: DBJ2A1
variable.description: J2a1. Potential contributing factors, diet four-hours before hypoglycemic event: missed meal

variable.name: DBJ2A2
variable.description: J2a2. Potential contributing factors, diet four-hours before hypoglycemic event: missed snack

variable.name: DBJ2A3
variable.description: J2a3. Potential contributing factors, diet four-hours before hypoglycemic event: missed-unknown

variable.name: DBJ2A4
variable.description: J2a4. Potential contributing factors, diet four-hours before hypoglycemic event: delayed meal

variable.name: DBJ2A5
variable.description: J2a5. Potential contributing factors, diet four-hours before hypoglycemic event: delayed snack

variable.name: DBJ2A6
variable.description: J2a6. Potential contributing factors, diet four-hours before hypoglycemic event: delayed-unknown

variable.name: DBJ2A7
variable.description: J2a7. Potential contributing factors, diet four-hours before hypoglycemic event: ate less than usual-no

variable.name: DBJ2A8
variable.description: J2a8. Potential contributing factors, diet four-hours before hypoglycemic event: ate less than usual-yes

variable.name: DBJ2A9
variable.description: J2a9. Potential contributing factors, diet four-hours before hypoglycemic event: ate less than usual-unknown

variable.name: DBJ2B1
variable.description: J2b1. Potential contributing factors. Characterize the patient's diet preceding this hypoglycemic event: diet 24 hours, exclude four hours, missed meal

variable.name: DBJ2B2
variable.description: J2b2. Potential contributing factors, characterize the patient's diet preceding this hypoglycemic event: diet 24 hours, exclude four hours, missed snack

variable.name: DBJ2B3
variable.description: J2b3. Potential contributing factors, characterize the patient's diet preceding this hypoglycemic event: diet 24 hours, exclude four hours, missed-unknown

variable.name: DBJ2B4
variable.description: J2b4. Potential contributing factors, characterize the patient's diet preceding this hypoglycemic event: diet 24 hours, exclude four hours, delayed meal

variable.name: DBJ2B5
variable.description: J2b5. Potential contributing factors, characterize the patient's diet preceding this hypoglycemic event: diet 24 hours, exclude four hours, delayed snack

variable.name: DBJ2B6
variable.description: J2b6. Potential contributing factors, characterize the patient's diet preceding this hypoglycemic event: diet 24 hours, exclude four hours, delayed-unknown

variable.name: DBJ2B7
variable.description: J2b7. Potential contributing factors, characterize the patient's diet preceding this hypoglycemic event: diet 24 hours, exclude four hours, less usual "No"

variable.name: DBJ2B8
variable.description: J2b8. Potential contributing factors, characterize the patient's diet preceding this hypoglycemic event: diet 24 hours exclude four hours: less usual "Yes"

variable.name: DBJ2B9
variable.description: J2b9. Potential contributing factors, characterize the patient's diet preceding this hypoglycemic event: diet 24 hours exclude four hours: less usual "Unknown"

variable.name: DBJ3A1
variable.description: J3a1. Potential contributing factors, were there any deviations from usual insulin dose algorithm preceding this hypoglycemic event? Alter insulin dose during four hours before

variable.name: DBJ3A2
variable.description: J3a2. Potential contributing factors, were there any deviations from usual insulin dose algorithm preceding this hypoglycemic event? Alter insulin dose 24 hours before event

variable.name: DBJ3B1
variable.description: J3b1. Potential contributing factors, were there any deviations from the timing or scheduling of insulin? Alter timing/scheduling insulin 4 hours prior

variable.name: DBJ3B2
variable.description: J3b2. Potential contributing factors, were there any deviations from the timing or scheduling of insulin? Alter time/scheduling insulin 24 hours prior

variable.name: DBJ4A
variable.description: J4a. Potential contributing factors, sex during 4 hours before hypoglycemic event

variable.name: DBJ4B
variable.description: J4b. Potential contributing factors, sex 24 hrs excluding 4 hours before hypoglycemic event

variable.name: DBJ5A
variable.description: J5a. Potential contributing factors, alcohol/drug during 4 hours before hypoglycemic event

variable.name: DBJ5B
variable.description: J5b. Potential contributing factors, alcohol/drug 24 hours exclude 4 hours before hypoglycemic event

variable.name: DBJ6A1
variable.description: J6a1. Potential contributing factors, glucose monitoring: self blood glucose

variable.name: DBJ6A2
variable.description: J6a2. Potential contributing factors, glucose monitoring: urine glucose

variable.name: DBJ6B
variable.description: J6b. Potential contributing factors, glucose monitoring: number of tests/week

variable.name: DBJ6C
variable.description: J6c. Potential contributing factors, expect glucose tests during prior 24 hours

variable.name: DBJ6D
variable.description: J6d. Potential contributing factors, week prior to event: 3 am blood glucose testing

variable.name: DBJ6E
variable.description: J6e. Potential contributing factors, three AM value - blood glucose testing before hypoglycemic event

variable.name: DBJ7A
variable.description: J7a. Potential contributing factors, patient menstruating at time of episode

variable.name: DBJ7B
variable.description: J7b. Potential contributing factors, oral contraceptive used at time of hypoglycemic event

variable.name: DBJ7C1
variable.description: J7c1. Potential contributing factors, menstrual cycle: regular, irregular, unknown.

variable.name: DBJ7C2
variable.description: J7c2. Potential contributing factors, menstrual cycle: if regular, usual length of menses cycle

variable.name: DBJ7D
variable.description: J7d. Potential contributing factors, relationship to menstrual cycle: blood/urine glucose change: time of menses

variable.name: DBJ8
variable.description: J8. Potential contributing factors, relationship to menstrual cycle: recent stress/other psychological disturbance

variable.name: DBJ9
variable.description: J9. Potential contributing factors, relationship to menstrual cycle: other potentially contributing factors

variable.name: DBJ10A
variable.description: J10a. Potential contributing factors: does the patient usually carry something to treat reaction?

variable.name: DBJ10B
variable.description: J10b. Potential contributing factors: did the patient have something to treat reactions with him at the time of the episode?

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. Deidentified form date

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. Deidentified patient ID

variable.name: DBA6
variable.description: A6. Identifying information. Deidentified date EDIC clinic learned inter. event

variable.name: DBCOMDAT
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. Deidentified date form completed
